item.description:
G'day all

McCormick and Schmick actually serves $1 oyster shooters for those who are interested. Oyster shooters don't start until later the night though. (Don't worry, this is a really good seafood restaurant, so the oysters are not from the Charles River :p)

They have pretty good food there, and some late night Happy Hour specials too. Some of us will be planning to grab a bite there and enjoy some autumn spiced beer.

If you're plannning to get there after 10, call me (KC) at 617 372 3664 to confirm whether we're still at the same venue.

Hope to see you there.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Thirsty Thursday (McCormick & Schmick's Faneuil Hall) 8PM
